description:
Vernan Kee designs, in collaboration with Natives Outdoors to empower Indigenous communities, bring their craft and love of getting outside to this beanie. Featuring an originally designed patch, the double-layer knit construction helps keep your head warm and cozy through all kinds of conditions. The benefits of Merino wool and the durability of polyester ensure this beanie keeps up for more snow days to come.

  • Vernan Kee designs by Smartwool®, brought together in collaboration with Natives Outdoors to empower Indigenous communities
  • Yarn combines the benefits of Merino wool with the enhanced durability of recycled polyester
  • Double-layer rib knit construction
name: Smartwool Chasing Mountains Patch Beanie - Unisex
